bioAsHtml: After more than ten years of work in IT service companies, I discovered the functional paradigm though Scala, and how functional programming could help to write better code. Starting with Javascript, I could then put some of these principles in practice. Since late 2017, I am happily working as a scala developer at Lizeo.
